name: Umeda Sky
description:
"luck"

A man who has lived his whole life in Japan resolves to bring change into his life by going to Europe, for a vacation.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2011-08-06. The photography, writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The title uses the Ren'Py engine created and modified by PyTom. The music was composed by evo. HTML version done by Alte. Estimated completion time is 25 minutes, but Umeda Sky cannot be finished.

Umeda Sky is game Nr. 21 of the Original 22.
